questions.question: Magnification factor is the ratio of ______

answers.a: zero frequency deflection and amplitude of steady state vibrations
answers.b: amplitude of steady state vibrations and zero frequency deflection
answers.c: amplitude of unsteady state vibrations and zero frequency distribution

questions.question: What is meant by phase difference or phase angle in forced vibrations?

answers.a: Difference between displacement vector (x<sub>p</sub>) and velocity vector V<sub>p</sub>
answers.b: Angle in which displacement vector leads force vector by (F<sub>0</sub> sinωt)
answers.c: Angle in which displacement vector (x<sub>p</sub>) lags force vector (F<sub>0</sub> sinωt)

questions.question: The equation m(d<sup>2</sup>x/ dt<sup>2</sup>) + c (dx/dt) + Kx = F<sub>0</sub> sin ωt is a second order differential equation. The solution of this linear equation is given as

answers.a: sum of complementary and particular function
answers.b: difference of complementary and particular function

questions.question:
Which of the following statements is/are true?
1. Magnification factor is minimum at resonance
2.The maximum value of amplification factor increases as damping factor decreases
3.The maximum value of amplification factor increases as damping factor increases
4.Magnification factor is maximum at resonance

answers.c: All the above statements are true
